Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur with StreamLAB Analytical Workcell using Thyroxine reagents
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Methodologies: Chemiluminescence using magnetic-particle solid phase and chemiluminescent label
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens ADVIA Centaur with StreamLAB Analytical Workcell and T4 assay for quantitative determination of thyroxine in serum using chemiluminescent technology
Indications for Use Summary: Automated immunoassay analyzer for in vitro quantitative determination of thyroxine (T4) in serum to aid in diagnosis and treatment of thyroid diseases
